artist: Artist: Takehara Shunchōsai; Artist: Shimokōbe Ikei (double page 10); Artist: Niwa Tōkei (double pages 17, 27, 29, 38, 41); Artist: Ishida Yūtei (double page 51); Artist: Takehara Shunsensai (double page 53); Author: Akisato Ritō
creditline: Gift of Captain G. B. Powell, Jr., JAGC, USA
description: soft-bound book with light blue cover; white label with black text on cover; some text pages; images include archer on horseback with man with hawk and man with dog accompanied by a woman in a landscape, people dining in an interior, procession of monks with two sculptures in a litter, aerial views of landscapes, procession with giant fish through streets between buildings with many onlookers, travelers passing a rocky stream, soldiers in armor on horseback
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
portfolio: From Pictorial Guide to Famous Sights in Settsu (Settsu meisho zue 摂津名所圖會)
text: Devoted to Arima County 有馬郡 and Nose County 能勢郡.
title: Pictorial Guide to Famous Sights in Settsu, vol. 9
